resources.string: Powerful database for storing topographic points, and use them in all my surveying applications. In one place, you can store all the information you need, and always have it at hand.
Full surveying manager, which includes all the necessary tools for layout and data collection in the field.
Application for all types of geodetic calculations. Generates a detailed report in txt format, with the entire sequence of calculations.
Application to generate reports and articles, in any situation where you are with your smartphone. You can even add a picture to it.
Surveying leveling. Special tools for roads and railways. The data collected in the field can burn them to a text file.
Complete tool for generating reviews topographic databases, and generate a PDF with all the information base.
Application designed to migrate between different DATUM coordinates, through a similarity transformation. Ideal for use in areas that are implementing new reference system.

Record all your observations, no matter what kind of instrument you have! All observations of your work always available to dump it into a text file, and even to calculate the traverse, and the coordinates of the observed points.
Select from website would like to purchase the application. From Geosoftware You can pay through PayPal.

Android developer specializing in the field of Surveying, Geodesy, and Civil Engineering.
